identity.philosophy: Fusion over Imitation. Emotion First. Content is King.

headings.usage: Hero titles, Section headers, Hall names

typography.installation: Import via Google Fonts in index.css: @import url('https://fonts.googleapis.com/css2?family=Lato:wght@400;700&family=Noto+Sans+Devanagari:wght@400;700&family=Playfair+Display:wght@600;700&display=swap');

usage_rules.background: bg-[#FDFBF7] (Cream) for main pages, bg-white for cards

visual_enhancers.textures: Subtle grain overlay on hero sections

buttons.primary: rounded-full px-8 py-3 font-serif tracking-wide transition-transform hover:scale-105
buttons.secondary: rounded-full px-8 py-3 border-2 font-sans tracking-wide

cards.hall_card: bg-white p-0 overflow-hidden rounded-2xl shadow-lg hover:shadow-xl transition-all duration-300 group
cards.service_card: bg-[#FDFBF7] p-6 border border-[#D4AF37]/10 rounded-xl hover:border-[#D4AF37]/40

om_lawns.alt: Om Lawns Banquet Hall - Grand Interior

shiv_lawns.alt: Shiv Lawns Banquet Hall - Elegant Setup

general: Do not use generic centered layouts.
Use 2-3x more spacing than typical designs (p-8, p-12).
accessibility: Add data-testid to all interactive elements.

file_structure.styles: Use Tailwind classes primarily, avoid custom CSS files unless necessary.

instructions_to_main_agent: Implement the Landing Page first with the Split Hero concept.
Create a 'Layout' component that handles the Navbar and Footer.
Use the provided image URLs for the respective sections.
Ensure the Admin Dashboard is distinct from the User Landing page (different layout wrapper).
Implement the Bilingual toggle (English/Marathi) using a React Context or simple state at the top level.
